data.title: Major Windows 11 Update
data.bodyText: Microsoft has released a major update for Windows 11, bringing performance improvements, security patches, and an enhanced Start menu experience. Users are encouraged to install the update to maintain system security and stability.

data.title: Intel Launches New Chips
data.bodyText: Intel has unveiled its next-gen processors, promising better AI performance and lower power consumption. The new series, built on the advanced Intel 4 process, targets laptops and high-end desktops.

data.title: Google Workspace Expands
data.bodyText: Google announced several new features for Workspace users, including AI-powered meeting summaries and smarter email drafting tools. These enhancements aim to boost productivity and collaboration in hybrid work environments.

data.title: GitHub Improves Security
data.bodyText: GitHub has rolled out enhanced security features for developers, such as mandatory two-factor authentication and improved secret scanning for repositories. The move follows an increase in cyberattacks targeting open-source projects.

data.title: Zoom Upgrades Platform
data.bodyText: Zoom has introduced new collaboration features, including integrated whiteboards, AI transcription, and meeting templates. These updates aim to make virtual meetings more dynamic and efficient for global teams.
